title: Pardis Technology Park
text:
Pardis Technology Park (PTP) () is under the auspices of the Vice-Presidency for Science and Technology. 
PTP is being directed by a <a href="board%20of%20trustees">board of trustees</a> which has 14 members. Head of the board is first <a href="Vice%20President%20of%20Iran">Vice President of Iran</a> and includes legal members from ministries, science centers, and academies.
It is located in an area measuring 58 hectares (expandable to 1000 hectares) and is situated 20 km north east of <a href="Tehran">Tehran</a>.
are three main existing phases in the Park. Other phases constitute the future stages in the expansion plan of the park which will eventually measure up to 1000 hectares. By being situated within the 97 km neighborhood of Imam Khomeini Int'l Airport (<a href="IKIA">IKIA</a>), it is located alongside the main north-south and east-west passages to <a href="Europe">Europe</a>, <a href="central%20Asia">central Asia</a>, <a href="Economic%20Cooperation%20Organization">ECO</a> countries, <a href="Persian%20Gulf">Persian Gulf</a>, and <a href="Commonwealth%20of%20Independent%20States">CIS</a> countries.
In addition to, <a href="science%20park">technology Park</a> is placed alongside the north-south <a href="fiber%20optic">fiber optic</a>s <a href="Telecommunications%20network">network</a> and close neighborhood to scientific, research and academic centers and also four <a href="Industrial%20park">industrial zone</a>s, i.e. Khorram-dasht and <a href="Firuzkuh%20County">Firouzkouh</a> industrial zones.
